mapper.select: SELECT distinct DATE_FORMAT(exam_date,'%Y-%m-%d') examDate,DATE_FORMAT(start_time,'%H:%i') startTime,DATE_FORMAT(end_time,'%H:%i') endTime FROM t_exam_arrange where exam_id=#{0} order by exam_date,start_time

select t.arrange_id as arrangeId,t.exam_id as examId,t.grade_id as gradeId, t.subject_id as subjectId,t.group_id as groupId ,t.exam_date as examDate, t.start_time as startTime,t.end_time as endTime from t_exam_arrange t where t.exam_id = #{0} and t.grade_id =#{1}

select t.arrange_id as arrangeId,t.exam_id as examId,t.grade_id as gradeId, t.subject_id as subjectId,t.group_id as groupId ,t.exam_date as examDate, t.start_time as startTime,t.end_time as endTime from t_exam_arrange t where t.exam_id = #{0} and t.grade_id =#{1} and t.group_id is null
